channel.description: Recent content in mobile on Sam Machin

item.title: Mobile Broadband signals the Death of WiFi Hotspots
item.description: Its been a long time since I last wrote a proper post and I doubt this will be that, however having just spent the afternoon chatting with the guys at carsonifiedabout whats happening in the mobile industry I’m feeling all inspired.

item.title: 2008 Predictions in Mobile
item.description: Better late than never, Ive put down some of my thoughts as to what _might_happen in the mobile industry in 2008.
